lyric:
[00:08.80]Is it only in my dreams?
[00:11.10]Is it only in my head?
[00:13.39]Are you lonely
[00:16.04]When you're lying in my bed?
[00:18.14]Is it only for tonight?
[00:20.43]Gonna leave me disappointed
[00:22.88]Only
[00:25.48]To take it all away
[00:28.04]Close my eyes
[00:30.37]And I-I
[00:32.81]Keep my distance
[00:35.19]I-I
[00:37.45]Can't let go, I
[00:39.87]I-I
[00:42.20]Know you're not mine, but I
[00:45.67]I know that I'm being selfish
[00:47.99]And I know that you want me too
[00:50.19]Can't help, but to touch your body
[00:52.47]And I-I
[00:55.06]Can't help that I'm being selfish
[00:57.31]When I know that you want me too
[00:59.60]Can't help, but to want you on me
[01:01.83]And I-I
[01:04.45]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[01:09.07]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[01:14.62]Is it just another lie?
[01:16.87]Am I just another high?

[01:24.00]When you run away from home
[01:26.22]Am I the one you go to

tlyric:
[by:南向12]
[00:08.80]这只是在我的梦里吗
[00:11.10]这只是在我的脑海里吗
[00:13.39]你感到孤单吗
[00:16.04]当你在我床上的时候
[00:18.14]只是在今晚吗
[00:20.43]只是给我留下失望
[00:22.88]仅仅
[00:25.48]把这一切都带走
[00:28.04]闭上双眼
[00:30.37]我应该
[00:32.81]保持距离
[00:35.19]我应该
[00:37.45]不应该放手
[00:39.87]我应该
[00:42.20]知道你是不属于我的，但我
[00:45.67]我知道我是自私的
[00:47.99]我知道你也想拥有我
[00:50.19]情不自禁，去触摸你的身体
[00:52.47]我
[00:55.06]情不自禁，我变得自私
[00:57.31]当知道你也想拥有我
[00:59.60]情不自禁，想要与你缠绵

[01:04.45]情不自禁，变得如此自私
